name: Aniket Basu Roy
content: â€Ž Aniket Basu Roy I am a Computer Science researcher affiliated to BITS Pilani Goa as an Assistant Professor. Before this, I was a postdoc in Aarhus, Paris, and Montpellier. I defended my Ph.D. thesis at the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. Research My broad research interests lie in Theoretical Computer Science, specifically in Discrete and Computational Geometry. List of Preprints/Publication Teaching Aug-Nov 2025 AIMLZC322 Discrete Mathematics and Graph Theory CS F222 Discrete Structures with Siddharth Gupta Jan-Apr 2025 BITS F232 Foundations of Data Structures and Algorithms with Bharat Deshpande Contact Office D-256 CS&IS Department BITS Pilani K K Birla Goa Campus NH 17B Bypass Road, Zuarinagar Goa 403726 India Phone: (+91) 832 258 0897 Email: aniketr AT goa.bits-pilani.ac.in | aniket.basu.roy AT gmail.com Or, fix a meeting here!
